html:
ball of black threads
goblet made of a skull
butterfly with wings of red
shoot densly entwines a wall
endless piles of golden coins
dry, smelly herbs
motorbike working its engine
a steel sword stuck in the ground
dead man swinging on a rope
conflagration digesting a city
a man trampled by a horse
obedient to the rider
coffee chilling in a cup
a ton of coal traveling in a train
a heart stopping because fear
viper eating a mouse
title: Goblet
